chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.subtitle: About This Release
chapter.para: OpenNMS 1.1 extends the work that was begun with 1.0 to make OpenNMS more powerful and easier to use. Almost all of the new functionality was suggested by current OpenNMS users. It is hoped that these improvements will prove useful, and will lead to even more suggestions on how to improve the product.
OpenNMS 1.0.2 is a maintenance release that fixes several code issues.
Please, let us know if you have any problems at all at the OpenNMS Bugzilla page.
